original_text: A person who is outside in his field must not go back to his home. He must not return even to fetch his coat.
korean_text: 밭에 있는 자는 겉옷을 가지러 뒤로 돌이키지 말지어다

sentences.original_text: A person who is outside in his field
must not go back to his home
He must not return even to fetch his coat
sentences.korean_translation: 겉옷을 가지러 오더라도 돌아오지 말아야 한다
